# Poisson Regression

### Load the data

```{r}
crab <- read.table("dat/crab.txt", row.names = 1)

colnames(crab) <- c("C", "S", "W", "Wt", "Sa")
```

### Fit a Poisson regression model

```{r}
crab.pois <- glm(Sa ~ factor(C) + factor(S) + W + Wt,
                 data = crab,
                 family = poisson)
```
